[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:14, topic:449053”][quote author=kill you704 link=topic=551949.msg4044557#msg4044557 date=1341972338]
Really, because I have had over 50 active registered members, who report every bug on forums. And I even ask everyone of them, this never happened to any. So you sir are wrong.
[/quote]Oh yes, because it just cannot be a problem on the server/client side, it’s obviously them.[/quote]
Obviously not, I mean private servers are perfect, after all

item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:10, topic:449053”]Quitting the server (I’m Rainbow dash) if you give a shit. My character apparently got reset for no reason, plus when I log in 90% of the time I’m invisible.

How is that a :fp:, you must of lagged then just complained because you think that its the server. No one has ever had that problem so theres no other reason for it…

I just had it and my connection is quite above average atm (around 500 kb/s 350 kb/s min) and I’m doing nothing else, so yes, it’s either you server or client.[/quote]

Really, because I have had over 50 active registered members, who report every bug on forums. And I even ask everyone of them, this never happened to any. So you sir are wrong.

Read full topic

Quitting the server (I’m Rainbow dash) if you give a shit. My character apparently got reset for no reason, plus when I log in 90% of the time I’m invisible.

kill you704:

How is that a :fp:, you must of lagged then just complained because you think that its the server. No one has ever had that problem so theres no other reason for it…

item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

kill you704:

Uhm, you check your internet. I’ve had over 100 registered members and this never happened to anyone… Your either lying or you honestly have horrible internet connection.

I’m not worried about it, I know the reason but I’m too lazy to deal with it. Good luck with the server though. And no… I don’t have horrible internet connection… :fP:

Read full topic

item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:5, topic:449053”]You need to update the webclient links on the forums (in the ‘Webclient’ thread). Nonetheless, I’m about to log into the server right now, hope I’m pleased.

Edit: I’ve logged into the server and the first thing that comes to me is that I’m invisible and frozen about 30 seconds after… -.-[/quote]

Uhm, you check your internet. I’ve had over 100 registered members and this never happened to anyone… Your either lying or you honestly have horrible internet connection.
